Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Well the most common way is post for your character arriving on Past-Earth after coming through the Trans-Warp rift by a small ship or in a alt mode. The scenario is free for you to come up with along with you characters back story.

On a side note: In this RPG in the TFs contemporary time, roughly 4,000,300 years in the future from the "Past-Earth" NBW is set, Cybertron has broken out in a 3rd Great War between the Maximals and Predacons as well as Maximals vs. G2 Decepticons on contemporary/future Earth. You can use those facts in your back story if you want. Hope that all makes sense.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:                               Hello,
 
 Thanks for the greetings! How would I intro a new
 character into the games? :)
